name: Cyril Arthur Wilkinson
notes: Printmaker, illustrator and designer; born in Wandsworth, London; designed posters for the Underground Group and London Central Omnibus Co Ltd and produced work for Sun Engraving Co. and London Metropolitan Railway; lived in Southgate, north Londo
